meanings.definition: People who renovate or improve something.
meanings.sent1: The revampers worked tirelessly to update the old building.
meanings.sent2: The team of revampers transformed the outdated kitchen into a modern space.
meanings.sent3: The revampers joked that they were like magical elves, making everything shiny and new.
meanings.sent4: The revampers were like artists, turning a blank canvas into a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The revampers were the heroes of the neighborhood, bringing new life to old spaces.

meanings.sent1: They decided to revamp the garden by adding colorful flowers.
meanings.sent2: She revampers her wardrobe every season to stay fashionable.
meanings.sent3: The family revampers their living room every few years, just for fun.
meanings.sent4: He revampers his website regularly to keep it fresh and engaging.
meanings.sent5: The company revampers its products to meet the changing needs of customers.
